original_text: And proclamation was made throughout Judah and Jerusalem to bring in for the Lord the tax that Moses the servant of God laid on Israel in the wilderness.
korean_text: 유다와 예루살렘에 공포하여 하나님의 종 모세가 광야에서 이스라엘에게 정한 세를 여호와께 드리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And proclamation was made throughout Judah and Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 유다와 예루살렘 온 땅에 선포가 있었고

sentences.original_text: to bring in for the Lord the tax
that Moses the servant of God laid on Israel
